localisedStrings.name: Català

string.source: Tea For God
Tea For God Demo
This is the demo version.

localisedStrings.string: Aquesta és la versió de demostració.

string.source: This is the demo version. The full version is available here: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/6323807174332876/

localisedStrings.string: Aquesta és la versió de demostració. La versió completa està disponible aquí: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/6323807174332876/

string.source: Customizable experience~There are two main game modes:~Standard Rules. Easy to understand, navigation that guides you to your current objective. The gameplay systems are simpler and are explained with tutorials.~Advanced Rules. More complex gameplay that requires exploration and experimenting. Resource managment gets harder as resources are scarcer. You have to find your own way through the world with use of the map.~The second important setting is about what happens when you fail:~Pause for a few seconds and continue.~Restart at the last checkpoint.~Restart the adventure.~Besides that, there is a range of modifiers, which may make the game much easier (up to where you have infinite health and ammo and there are no robots, even the ones that do not harm you) or much harder (tougher, more aggressive enemies that are quicker to attack, no navigation aid and more).

localisedStrings.string: Experiència personalitzable~Hi ha dos modes de joc principals:~Regles estàndard. Fàcil d'entendre, navegació que us guiarà cap al vostre objectiu actual. Els sistemes de joc són més senzills i s'expliquen amb tutorials.~Regles avançades. Un joc més complex que requereix exploració i experimentació. La gestió dels recursos es fa més difícil a mesura que els recursos són més escassos. Has de trobar el teu propi camí pel món amb l'ús del mapa.~La segona configuració important és sobre què passa quan falles:~Pausa uns segons i continua.~Reinicia a l'últim punt de control.~Reinicia l'aventura.~A més d'això, hi ha una sèrie de modificadors, que poden fer que el joc sigui molt més fàcil (fins a on tinguis una salut i munició infinites, i fins i tot no hi ha robots més agressius ni més agressius). enemics que són més ràpids d'atacar, sense ajuda per a la navegació i més).

string.source: Impossible spaces~Tea For God utilises the concept of impossible spaces, a Euclidean orbifold. The world is composed of spaces that overlap each other making it possible to travel through a big world, while never leaving your play-area.

localisedStrings.string: Espais impossibles~Tea For God utilitza el concepte d'espais impossibles, un orbifold euclidià. El món es compon d'espais que se superposen entre si i permeten viatjar per un món gran, sense sortir mai de la teva zona de joc.

string.source: Key features~Use your own feet to move, no teleporting, no sliding.~Adjusts to your play-area, no matter how small or how big it is.~Customize your experience, make it as easy or as hard as you desire.~Procedurally generated world with a linear story and handcrafted key scenes.~

localisedStrings.string: Característiques clau~Fes servir els teus propis peus per moure't, sense teletransportar-te, sense lliscar.~S'ajusta a la teva àrea de joc, per petita o gran que sigui.~Personalitza la teva experiència, fes-ho tan fàcil o tan difícil com vulguis.~Món generat per procediments amb una història lineal i escenes clau fetes a mà.~

string.source: Play-area~As the game adjusts to the available space, there are some minimal requirements. The smallest space handled by the game is 1.8m x 1.2m (6ft x 4ft). If you have less than that, the game will use horizontal scaling to make the world appear larger, bringing the minimal space down to 90cm x 60cm (3ft x 2ft).

localisedStrings.string: Zona de joc~A mesura que el joc s'adapta a l'espai disponible, hi ha uns requisits mínims. L'espai més petit que gestiona el joc és d'1,8 m x 1,2 m (6 peus x 4 peus). Si teniu menys d'això, el joc utilitzarà l'escala horitzontal per fer que el món sembli més gran, reduint l'espai mínim a 90 cm x 60 cm (3 peus x 2 peus).

string.source: Procedural generation~It's the procedural generation that makes many things possible. To fully utilise impossible concepts, the game generates the world to fit within your play-area. The procedural generation doesn't stop with there. Almost everything you see is created with the use of procedural generation, carefully created algorithms that generate robots, how they look and move, devices, weapons and more.

localisedStrings.string: Generació procedimental~És la generació procedimental que fa possible moltes coses. Per utilitzar al màxim els conceptes impossibles, el joc genera el món per adaptar-se a la vostra àrea de joc. La generació processal no s'atura aquí. Gairebé tot el que veus es crea amb l'ús de la generació procedimental, algorismes creats acuradament que generen robots, com es veuen i es mouen, dispositius, armes i molt més.

string.id: ! game desc; desc; world and story
string.source: The world and the story~As you venture further into the complex, you will listen to a recording that will introduce you to the world but will provide you with even more questions. For the answers, you will have to look alone. They won't be given on a silver plate. You're not welcome in this vast strange complex. You will fight hordes of robots, find unlikely allies. You will bring ritual tea for God. Just beware of the being that lurks in the darkness.

localisedStrings.string: El món i la història~A mesura que t'aventures més endins al complex, escoltaràs una gravació que t'introduirà al món però que et donarà encara més preguntes. Per a les respostes, hauràs de mirar sol. No es donaran en un plat de plata. No ets benvingut en aquest complex estrany. Lluitaràs contra hordes de robots, trobaràs aliats poc probables. Portaràs te ritual per a Déu. Només compte amb l'ésser que s'amaga a la foscor.

string.source: God Emperor is held in a place beyond our world. Explore a huge strange complex while fighting hordes of robots. All while you keep walking around your room, bringing the immersion to another level. Customise your experience into an intense shooter, a roguelite explorer, a relaxing trek.

localisedStrings.string: Déu Emperador es manté en un lloc més enllà del nostre món. Explora un complex estrany enorme mentre lluites contra hordes de robots. Tot mentre continues caminant per la teva habitació, portant la immersió a un altre nivell. Personalitza la teva experiència en un shooter intens, un explorador roguelite, una caminada relaxant.

string.source: Tea For God is a VR adventure that uses impossible spaces with procedural generation to allow players infinite movement within their own room. Customizable gameplay can be anything between a relaxing long walk, an intense arcade shooter (checkpoint based) and a roguelite shooter-explorer.~In the distant future, humankind has been united, ruled by God Emperor. Endowed with advanced technology we reached stars, colonised new worlds, went onto endless crusades against myriads of civilisations.~Personal tragedies tend to be meaningless against the time. But once in a while, one person may start a fire that can change the fate of the whole universe. A man who lost his family, who holds God Emperor accountable for their death, seeking answers and vengeance, embarks onto his last journey to the place no human has ever left alive, where God Emperor is believed to reside.~

localisedStrings.string: Tea For God és una aventura de realitat virtual que utilitza espais impossibles amb generació procedimental per permetre als jugadors un moviment infinit dins de la seva pròpia habitació. El joc personalitzable pot ser qualsevol cosa entre una llarga caminada relaxant, un joc d'arcade intens (basat en un punt de control) i un explorador de tiradors roguelite.~En un futur llunyà, la humanitat ha estat unida, governada per l'Emperador Déu. Dotats d'una tecnologia avançada, vam arribar a les estrelles, vam colonitzar nous mons, vam anar a croades interminables contra miríades de civilitzacions.~Les tragèdies personals acostumen a no tenir sentit amb el temps. Però de tant en tant, una persona pot iniciar un incendi que pot canviar el destí de tot l'univers. Un home que va perdre la seva família, que fa responsable de l'Emperador Déu per la seva mort, buscant respostes i venjança, s'embarca en el seu darrer viatge cap al lloc que cap humà ha deixat amb vida, on es creu que resideix l'Emperador Déu.

string.source: Explore a vast world by just simply walking, never leaving your own room.

localisedStrings.string: Exploreu un món vast simplement caminant, sense sortir mai de la vostra habitació.

string.source: VR adventure that allows infinite movement within your own room. Customise your experience. Make it an intense shooter, a roguelite explorer, a relaxing trek.

localisedStrings.string: Aventura de realitat virtual que permet un moviment infinit dins de la teva pròpia habitació. Personalitza la teva experiència. Fes-ne un shooter intens, un explorador roguelite, una caminada relaxant.

string.source: Tea For God is a VR adventure that uses impossible spaces with procedural generation to allow players infinite movement within their own room. Customizable gameplay can be anything between a relaxing long walk, an intense arcade shooter (checkpoint based) and a roguelite shooter-explorer.~Set in the distant future, it is a story about a man who has lost his family and embarks on his last journey to seek answers and vengeance.

localisedStrings.string: Tea For God és una aventura de realitat virtual que utilitza espais impossibles amb generació procedimental per permetre als jugadors un moviment infinit dins de la seva pròpia habitació. El joc personalitzable pot ser qualsevol cosa entre una llarga caminada relaxant, un intens joc de trets arcade (basat en un punt de control) i un explorador de tiradors roguelite.~Ambientada en un futur llunyà, és una història sobre un home que ha perdut la seva família i s'embarca en el seu darrer viatge per buscar respostes i venjança.

string.id: hub:game loading tips; blind and deaf robots (message)
string.source: some robots don't have visual or audio sensors~~they don't see you, neither they hear you~

localisedStrings.string: some robots don't have visual or audio sensors~~they don't see you, neither they hear you~

string.id: hub:game loading tips; complex rules mode (message)
string.source: advanced rules introduce more gameplay mechanisms~~besides resource management, there are numerous devices whose purpose has to be discovered by the player~~the navigation does not provide a path towards the objective - requires the use of the map

localisedStrings.string: advanced rules introduce more gameplay mechanisms~~besides resource management, there are numerous devices whose purpose has to be discovered by the player~~the navigation does not provide a path towards the objective - requires the use of the map

string.source: the primary source for energy are wall-mounted dispensers~~you can get access to extra energy via upgrades or inside some of the robots

localisedStrings.string: the primary source for energy are wall-mounted dispensers~~you can get access to extra energy via upgrades or inside some of the robots

string.id: hub:game loading tips; experience rules mode (message)
string.source: experience rules work the best as an introduction to vr and to the game~~levels are linear, there are no devices to use, ammo is infinite and health regenerates~~there is no story, no voiceovers, no overlay info

localisedStrings.string: experience rules work the best as an introduction to vr and to the game~~levels are linear, there are no devices to use, ammo is infinite and health regenerates~~there is no story, no voiceovers, no overlay info

string.id: hub:game loading tips; friends and foes (message)
string.source: not all entities you meet are hostile~~some may even be turned to your side~~try picking them up, examine them,~look for buttons, levers and handles~

localisedStrings.string: not all entities you meet are hostile~~some may even be turned to your side~~try picking them up, examine them,~look for buttons, levers and handles~

string.source: the map gives a simplified overview of the region around you~~the world is divided into cells and to move from one cell to another, you have to follow the door direction displays~~door direction displays show absolute directions, ie. up on the door direction display is up on the map

localisedStrings.string: the map gives a simplified overview of the region around you~~the world is divided into cells and to move from one cell to another, you have to follow the door direction displays~~door direction displays show absolute directions, ie. up on the door direction display is up on the map

string.source: some weapons may be ineffective against certain targets~~examples:~~- discharge weapon won't penetrate shield~~- non-piercing projectile won't do damage to fully armoured target

localisedStrings.string: some weapons may be ineffective against certain targets~~examples:~~- discharge weapon won't penetrate shield~~- non-piercing projectile won't do damage to fully armoured target

string.id: hub:game loading tips; simple rules mode (message)
string.source: standard rules focus on action and adventure~~resource management is simplified and there are less things to learn~~while the navigation is simplified (when compared to advanced rules), it is still possible to go in any direction you desire

localisedStrings.string: standard rules focus on action and adventure~~resource management is simplified and there are less things to learn~~while the navigation is simplified (when compared to advanced rules), it is still possible to go in any direction you desire

string.source: weapons use common energy storages~~this means that they don't have their own storages but share storage in your arm~~each weapon is made of interchangeable parts that affect its stats and features

localisedStrings.string: les armes utilitzen emmagatzematge d'energia comuns~~això vol dir que no tenen els seus propis emmagatzematges, sinó que comparteixen emmagatzematge al braç~~cada arma està feta de peces intercanviables que afecten les seves estadístiques i característiques

string.source: your primary weapons are attached to your forearms~~if you release them, they are holstered there~~to replace your primary weapon, remove it from your forearm~

localisedStrings.string: your primary weapons are attached to your forearms~~if you release them, they are holstered there~~to replace your primary weapon, remove it from your forearm~

string.source: the game is highly customizable~~to adjust the difficulty, make the game harder or easier, select game modifiers from the main menu~~the options menu allows adjusting various aspects of the game: controls, play area buffer, haptics and more

localisedStrings.string: the game is highly customizable~~to adjust the difficulty, make the game harder or easier, select game modifiers from the main menu~~the options menu allows adjusting various aspects of the game: controls, play area buffer, haptics and more

string.source: if your play area is too small, go to options and try one of suggested actions~~1. use horizontal scaling to make the play area appear larger~~2. use "joystick movement" to stand in one place and move with joysticks~~note: the game is developed with roomscale movement in mind and it is highly encouraged to play it this way

localisedStrings.string: if your play area is too small, go to options and try one of suggested actions~~1. use horizontal scaling to make the play area appear larger~~2. use "joystick movement" to stand in one place and move with joysticks~~note: the game is developed with roomscale movement in mind and it is highly encouraged to play it this way

string.source: the game will keep you within the designated play area~~all the space beyond walkable surfaces might be outside the play area~~avoid going through bars, jumping over gaps, waving your arms above chasms

localisedStrings.string: el joc us mantindrà dins de l'àrea de joc designada~~tot l'espai més enllà de les superfícies transitables pot estar fora de l'àrea de joc~~evitar passar per reixes, saltar per sobre de buits, agitar els braços per sobre dels avencs

string.source: if you feel dizzy, unwell, take a break~~before you start the game, you always have an access to the shortened accessibility options~~for more, check the options menu

localisedStrings.string: if you feel dizzy, unwell, take a break~~before you start the game, you always have an access to the shortened accessibility options~~for more, check the options menu

string.source: for more, visit options
no camera shake
allow (rare) camera shake
confirm and continue

joystick movement
